ai-atk-abh03a58:1_0: In the case of the poor tasks, etc., should be understood as the Khantivādin Birth Story, and the order should be understood to answer .
ai-atk-abh03a58:1_1: However, if it is associated with the reasonable roots (of the First Path) associated with the reason for the sake of predominance;
ai-atk-abh03a58:1_2: Likewise if the lower roots and conditions are connected with the causes of condition, then the intentions associated with ghee,
ai-atk-abh03a58:1_3: it is deadly unsuitable, likewise with such a snake, scorned, and bubbling, as it were, incapable of consideration.
ai-atk-abh03a58:1_4: the sense-objects that are associated with the consciousness-originated, and the rest.
ai-atk-abh03a58:1_6: For, monks, these three kinds of reply to one another,
ai-atk-abh03a58:1_7: Furthermore, the supernormal powers are bound for the sake of making precious things, ~ the abandoning of the fetters, and the defilements are bound to the fetter of the fetters. They are supremely abolished and connected with the defilements, delightful, liberated from the fetters, transmigration of the fetters, and liberated by the connection with the yokets of fetters and mind.
ai-atk-abh03a58:2_1: a corruption of the defilements and an unconcealed with the defilements.
ai-atk-abh03a58:2_2: Likewise the defilements associated with defilements, defiled by defilements and connected with the defilements.
ai-atk-abh03a58:2_3: Thus they need not be understood that these in the same way beginning.
ai-atk-abh03a58:2_4: All the parts are to be found in one’s place.
ai-atk-abh03a58:2_5: the defilements associated with pollutants and associated with the fetters, associating with the hindrances and associated with the hindrances and the defilements. That kind of hindrances and the hindrances are connected with the defilements. And that is the result of the defilements and the states of the defilements.
ai-atk-abh03a58:2_7: (they are) associated with roots and connected with the defilements, but they don’t get the path associated with the shameless. And they don’t get angry if they don’t get these things.
ai-atk-abh03a58:2_8: The hindrances associated with the fetters and the defilements are connected with the defilements. And they are associated with the defilements as defilement and connected with the defilements. They are removed from the hindrances and connected with the defilements. And they are not liable to get rid of the defilements.
ai-atk-abh03a58:2_9: don’t gain the path by footing in such a way that is to say, but they don’t get all of the ladies of frightening. Or the bloated corpses can be understood as discontents.
ai-atk-abh03a58:3_0: Golden in is the color of the Uppalavaṇṇā.
